Original:

肋排入味，肉軟嫩容易脫骨。
莎莎醬超喜歡！

遇到駐唱日，環境氣氛很像花東的小酒吧，放鬆舒適。

The ribs are delicious, and the flesh is soft and tender and easy to break off.

Original:
喝到新推出的火龍果特調～
喝得出來是新鮮火龍果現打的 不甜膩 酒感不重 推推🫶
當天剛好有現場表演（店家fb上會有公布表演消息唷）
異國風情濃厚～很放鬆愉快的夜晚✨
只可惜當天天氣實在太熱了，作為是戶外開放式的，所以沒有待太久
不過店家有放蚊香在旁邊，超容易被🦟咬的我，這次都沒有被咬☺️
ps 很適合泡完湯來小酌幾杯 ♨️
EN:
Drink the newly launched dragon fruit special ~
It can be drunk that the fresh fire dragon fruit is not sweet and wine is not heavy.
On the same day, there was a live performance (the performance news will be announced on the store FB)
The exotic style is strong ~ very relaxed and happy night ✨
Unfortunately, the weather was too hot that day, as an outdoor open, so I didn’t stay too long.
However, the store has mosquito coils next to me, and it is very easy to be bitten by me. Nothing is bitten this time ☺️
PS is very suitable for the soup to drink a few cups ♨️

Original:
平日晚上人不多的時間用餐，老闆非常親切與熱情，會來關心舒適度、口味等等，環境很chill，假日會有音樂演唱的活動，推薦好友同行，看著綠蔭植栽放鬆身心👩‍🌾

瑪格麗特披薩🍕 $380 🌕🌕🌕🌕
義式披薩餅皮，Q軟的口感很棒，起司給的豐富，但感覺少了一些番茄和羅勒襯托出來的清香感，下次會嘗試不同口味～

薯塊🍟 $200 🌕🌕🌕🌕🌕
大推，不過建議3人以上分食，馬鈴薯塊明顯是自己製作，豐盛且炸物功力很不錯，絕對要搭配辣醬🌶️嘗試

調酒-白色佳人🍸 $300 🌕🌕🌕🌕🌕
酒感後勁十足，酸甜口味算是很剛好，不會太過，搭配風景微風，很舒服！
EN:
There is not much time for people to eat on weekdays. The boss is very kind and enthusiastic. He will care about comfort, taste, etc. The environment is very chill. There will be music singing activities on holidays. Recommended friends to accompany you. Bleak

Margaret pizza 3 $ 380 🌕🌕🌕🌕
Italian pizza cake skin, Q's soft taste is great, the cheese is rich, but it feels missing some tomatoes and the sense of fragrance of Laler, and will try different flavors next time ~

Potatoes $ $ 200 🍟
Great push, but it is recommended to eat more than 3 people. The potato pieces are obviously made by themselves. The abundant and fried skills are very good. You must use spicy sauce 🌶️ Try

Bartending-white beauty $ $ 300 🌕🌕🌕🌕🌕
The wine is full of strength, the sweet and sour taste is just right, it will not be too much. It is very comfortable with the scenery of the landscape!

Original: 在卡胡精釀啤酒花園 (Kahu Craft Beer Garden - 精釀啤酒花園) 度過了一個晚上，這是一次相當不錯的體驗。位於寧靜的北投溪旁，其氛圍非常適合放鬆身心。工作人員熱情好客，讓每個人都有賓至如歸的感覺。精釀啤酒的選擇很出色，雖然食物很好，但並不特別。鑑於其優越的地理位置和優質的飲料，它是北投的一個不錯的地方，值得一去。我的四星評論反映了這些重要方面和需要改進的領域的組合。
EN: It was a night after the Kahu Craft Beer Garden -Craft Beer Garden), which was a pretty good experience.Located next to the quiet Beitou Creek, the atmosphere is very suitable for relaxation.The staff is enthusiastic and hospitable, so that everyone feels like a guest.The choice of craft beer is excellent. Although the food is good, it is not special.Given its superior geographical location and high -quality drinks, it is a good place in Beitou, which is worth going.My four -star comment reflects these important aspects and combinations that need to be improved.

Original: 我們喜歡卡胡！  沿河的氣氛美麗而寧靜，我們喜歡這裡的食物、啤酒和現場音樂！  下次來北投一定還會再來！

Original: 很棒的酒吧。我們去那裡是為了去溫泉，在那裡待太久了。不錯的啤酒選擇，超級友好的氛圍，經營這個地方的女士非常棒。強烈推薦。 （不過也許只有在你第二天沒有計劃的情況下才可以。宿醉很痛苦…）

Original:
地點好，氣氛好。

The location is good and the atmosphere is good.
I have a very relaxed time with a friendly staff!

If you are tired of Chinese food and B -level food,
I highly recommend it.

If I get the next order again
・ Because the text is difficult to understand, please attach a Japanese menu with meals.
・ I hope that drinks and meals can be more reasonable.
・ Show the meal photos and prices at the entrance
I think so.

Original: 牆上的一個洞（實際上是在路下）當地的潛水酒吧有一個美麗的花園。食物相當簡單，飲料菜單也不太長，但氣氛真是棒極了。天氣好的時候可以在戶外喝一杯冷飲的地方。強烈建議停下來！

Original: 很棒的食物。美味的飲料。很棒的音樂。工作人員非常友好和體貼。如果我能給這個地方 6 顆星，我會給。我一定會再回到這裡。

Original: 他們釀造精釀啤酒並以生啤酒形式供應。披薩很好吃，而且還有英式的餡餅，這在台灣一定很少見吧！一切都很好。戶外座位很好，他們提供驅蚊劑供客人使用。

Original: 絕對可愛的咖啡館。披薩很棒（而且實際上很大——在這裡很難找到像樣大小的披薩！），啤酒很便宜，而且裝飾/氛圍讓你感覺自己身處新西蘭某個很酷的地方。我一定會回來的。

Original: 絕對是一家值得一去的很棒的酒吧！這個地方有室內和室外座位，都很漂亮。在那裡工作的人非常有趣和友好。他們有優質的啤酒和葡萄酒。

Original: 食物和飲料對於氛圍來說是次要的。然而，菜單是對當地美食的一次愉快的休息。在我們的飲料和小吃期間，播放清單是古巴/拉丁美洲的，重點是在台灣的自然美景中愉快地返回拉丁美洲。

Original: 相當涼爽的地方。顯然有一群常客在這裡閒逛。啤酒很不錯，披薩也不錯，但最好的是氛圍和啤酒花園。山上的位置也很酷。
EN: Quite a cool place.Obviously a group of frequent customers wandered here.Beer is very good and pizza is also good, but the best is the atmosphere and beer garden.The location on the mountain is also cool.

Original: 如果您想逃離城市的喧囂，但又不能走得太遠，那麼可以嘗試卡胡。他們是一家木製小餐廳，位於一條可愛的小河上方。而且美式菜單也很美味！他們知道如何製作美味的蘑菇湯以及幾種不同種類的義式烤麵包。
EN: If you want to escape the hustle and bustle of the city, but you can't go too far, you can try Kahu.They are a small wooden restaurant, located above a cute little river.And the American menu is also delicious!They know how to make delicious mushroom soup and several different types of Italian baked bread.

Original: 週六晚上他們有一些現場音樂表演。如果你住在溫泉區，這個地方很適合喝一兩杯。草案中的 IPA 渾濁。披薩還可以。

Original: 這是我上週五第二次來。第一次我們和幾個朋友一起點了很多所以也許我沒有註意到。但周五我正在開車。所以我只喝了一杯軟性飲料，我父母各喝了啤酒。當我付款時，我發現有些不對勁。我再次檢查了價格，他們試圖收取更多費用。當心。
EN: This is the second time I came last Friday.For the first time we ordered a lot with a few friends, so maybe I didn't notice it.But I am driving on Friday.So I only drank a cup of soft drinks, and my parents drank beer.When I paid, I found something wrong.I checked the price again, and they tried to charge more fees.Beware.

Original:
這個地方有很棒的精釀啤酒。儘管他們的水龍頭選擇可以使用更多的多樣性。太多的果味啤酒。我喜歡上好的啤酒花 IPA，但他們只有一款。  但這很棒。  氣氛很好。與友好的調酒師聊天。  我去的時候是淡季，所以人不是很多，不過也沒關係。

如果您渴望一些當地生產的精釀啤酒，那麼絕對值得一看。
EN:
This place has great craft beer.Although their faucet chooses more diversity.Too many fruit beer.I like good beer IPA, but they only have one.But this is great.The atmosphere is very good.Chat with friendly bartender.When I went, there were not many people, so there were not many people, but it didn't matter.

If you long for some local produce beer, then it is definitely worth seeing.

Original: 一個吃披薩、精釀啤酒和玩飛鏢的有趣地方！店主約翰尼非常友善。  美麗的戶外空間
EN: An interesting place to eat pizza, craft beer and play darts!The owner Johnny is very friendly.Beautiful outdoor space

Original: 友好而樂於助人的員工、種類繁多的啤酒和美味的菜單都位於一個美麗的位置。這裡不能出錯！
EN: Friendly and helpful employees, a variety of beer and delicious menu are in a beautiful position.You can't make a mistake here!

Original: 精品啤酒花園的感覺，提供當地精釀啤酒，味道不錯。安靜舒適，友善的業主。
EN: The feeling of boutique beer garden provides local craft beer and tastes good.Quiet and comfortable, friendly owner.

Original: 當我在北投溫泉洗完澡後到達時，一隻狗對我狂吠。狗的主人（而不是酒吧的主人）說，現在我在酒吧受到了熱烈的歡迎，所以我知道我會喜歡它。這是一家給人加勒比風格的開放式酒吧/餐廳。我沒有嘗試食物，只吃了食物，但是我們為其他顧客提供的菜餚看起來很美味。
EN: When I arrived after I took a shower in Beitou Hot Spring, a dog bark at me.The owner of the dog (not the owner of the bar) said that now I have been warmly welcomed in the bar, so I know I will like it.This is an open bar/restaurant for the Caribbean style.I didn't try food and only ate food, but the dishes we provided for other customers looked delicious.

Original: 涼爽的戶外小場所，配有木炭烤架，營業至深夜
EN: Cool outdoor places, equipped with charcoal grilled racks, open until late at night

Original:
這個地方很可愛！甜蜜的河流在你旁邊流淌，啤酒可供選擇。但我不能忍受硬紙板披薩。配料還不錯，醬汁也很好吃。但這就像吃底部的披薩盒一樣。我不能說我會回到這裡，除非他們除了披薩之外還有其他菜單項目。

更新！自從我寫這篇評論以來，我已經來過這裡好幾次了。我仍然不能說披薩很棒。但它的其他一切都很好，它是人們聚會的好地方，工作人員也很棒。它凌駕於其他一切之上。將 3 星提升至 5 星。
EN:
This place is cute!The sweet river flows next to you, and beer is available.But I can't stand hard cardboard pizza.The ingredients are not bad, and the sauce is also delicious.But this is like eating the bottom pizza box.I can't say that I will return here, unless they have other menu items in addition to pizza.

renew!Since I wrote this comment, I have been here several times.I still can't say that pizza is great.But everything else is good. It is a good place for people to meet, and the staff is also great.It is over everything else.Raise 3 stars to 5 stars.

Original: 披薩還可以，但是相對於它的品質來說價格太高了。這個地方很漂亮。啤酒好喝！這個地方對狗友善。
EN: Pizza is okay, but the price is too high compared to its quality.This place is beautiful.Beer is delicious!This place is friendly to dogs.

Original:

Original: 這是一個非常令人興奮和寒冷的地方！不幸的是我沒能像之前吃過的那樣嘗試這裡的食物，但是這裡的氛圍和飲料都很棒！業主和工作人員都非常友好而且非常有趣！調酒師對飲料的態度是致命的。超好的！我下次去台灣一定會再來。
EN: This is a very exciting and cold place!Unfortunately, I have not tried the food here as I have eaten before, but the atmosphere and drink here are great!The owners and staff are very friendly and very interesting!The alcoholic attitude towards drinks is fatal.so good!I will come again next time I go to Taiwan.

Original: 我有點想保守這個地方的秘密，因為坐在外面一個宜人的花園區，周圍很少有人，真是太好了，但它太好了，不能不支持。精選桶裝啤酒、一些非常好的軟性飲料、美味的披薩，以及我們尚未嘗試的一些有趣的其他菜餚。會定期來這裡。
EN: I want to keep the secrets of this place, because sitting in a pleasant garden area outside, there are few people around, it is really good, but it is so good that it must not support it.Selected barrel beer, some very good soft drinks, delicious pizza, and some other interesting dishes we have not tried.Will come here regularly.

Original: 泡完溫泉出去散步，吃了披薩，喝了一杯台灣生啤酒👍很喜歡，價格比台灣平均價格貴一點。 …
